name: Terror and Romance at Ohio high(demo)
name_original: Terror and Romance at Ohio high(demo)
description:
Terror and romance at Ohio high is a Visual novel made for the Bad art game jam 

It's basically a demo(we don't actually know if we are gonna continue it ) but it's a small romance comedy vn where you meet two characters, Rain, and Hans, who each belong to a different club and you got to decide which club to join and who are you gonna romance.

It was made by Zejbo32 and thatcrispyperson!
